name.en: Internet of Things System Design and Application
name.ch: 物聯網系統設計與應用

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
"-建立物聯網專業知識與基本研究能力
-訓練建構物聯網系統並提升實作能力
-培養發展自主思考與跨領域創新能力"
goal.en:
"-Be able to understand the fundamental knowledge of IoT (Internet of Things) and be able to have basic research skills
-Be able to construct IoT (Internet of Things) system and the ability to implement the basic components of the system
-Be able to development self-learning skills and inter-disciplinary learning skills"

outline.ch:
"1. Python與Arduino
2. Firmata通訊協定與pySerial函式庫
3. 物件導向設計
4. Python-Arduino原型設計
5. Python GUI
6. 儲存與繪製Arduino資料
7. Arduino網路介紹
8. Arduino與物聯網
9. 專題-設計感測裝置
10 專題-遠端感測裝置"
outline.en:
"1. Python and Arduino
2. Firmata protocol and pySerial library
3. Object-oriented design
4. Python-Arduino prototyping
5. Python GUI
6. Store and draw Arduino data
7. Arduino Network Introduction
8. Arduino and the Internet of Things
9. Design sensing device
10. Remote Sensing Device Development11."

"""Building Arduino Projects for the Internet of Things""
""Designing Embedded Systems with Arduino: A Fundamental Technology for Makers"""
textbook.en:
